speaker: Doctor
text: Good morning, Mr. Johnson. How have you been managing with your COPD medications lately?

speaker: Patient
text: Morning, Doctor. I've been using the tiotropium daily, and the albuterol only when I feel really short of breath.

speaker: Doctor
text: That's good to hear. Have you noticed any side effects from the tiotropium?

speaker: Patient
text: Not really, but sometimes I feel a bit dry in the mouth. It's not too bothersome though.

speaker: Doctor
text: Okay, that's a common side effect. As for your blood pressure, how are you doing with the lisinopril?

speaker: Patient
text: The lisinopril seems to be working fine. I haven't had any issues with it, unlike the beta-blockers before.
